Member Function Documentation

void RunTimeEnvironment::profilesReport ( float  totalSeconds = 0  ) 

RunTimeEnvironment::profilesReport Synopsis:

UNIX ONLY: this API is not intended for Windows. There is no Windows check because the Profile object is coded to be empty on Windows platform. This API will just be a no-op if called on the Windows platform.

Report to standard error on the various dynamic timings created in m_profiles hash.

Parameters:
totalSeconds - the total run time.
Returns:
- void, prints report to stand error.

Definition at line 112 of file RunTimeEnvironment.cpp.

Referenced by TranslationEngine::runImp().

void RunTimeEnvironment::setVerbosity ( ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM  level  ) 

RunTimeEnvironment::setVerbosity: Synopsis:

Should not be used during normal coding. This is a debug API used to pass a different verbosity level to child functions that respect such things. Although in practive most verbose levels are hard-coded.

Parameters:
level - the ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM level to set.
